metadata.title: CVE-2021-3467 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in the way Jasper versions before2.0.26 handled component references in CDEF box in the JP2 image formatdecoder. A specially crafted JP2 image file could cause an applicationusing the Jasper library to crash when opened.

criterions.comment: jasper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
